# Next.js Skills

Skills for Next.js development and optimization.

## Available Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `nextjs:create-route` | Create a new App Router route |
| `nextjs:optimize` | Optimize Next.js performance |
| `nextjs:migrate-page` | Migrate from Pages to App Router |

## Usage

```bash
# Create a new route
doyaken skill nextjs:create-route --path=/dashboard/settings

# Optimize performance
doyaken skill nextjs:optimize

# Migrate a page
doyaken skill nextjs:migrate-page --page=about
```
